**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-06T01:40:08Z" title="03/06/2016 01:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 6, 2016</time> by Kuzzter**

**IT IS UPDATE TIME!**

Finally the 1.0.0 Release ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

- New Parts:
    - Added Central Hub
    - Added Garage Parts (5x)
    - Added Inline-drill
    - Added landing-gear for the underside of parts
    - Added container version of the science-jr.
- Mod Support:
    - Updated Mod-Support for DeepFreeze
    - Updated Mod-Support for USI-LS
    - Rebalanced TAC-LS (permanent bases on some planets are now possible)
    - Added Drill for Water for TAC-LS and USI-LS
- Enhancements:
    - Changed the structure of the mod folder to easier remove unwanted parts
    - Added support for symmetrical attachment for the bi/triple couplers
    - All parts that decouple now also have a sound and particles when they decouple
- Bug Fixes:
    - Removed Surface Attach abilit of landing gear to avoid missing decouple bug
    - Wheels on the new landing gear now rotate to the right direction when driving
    - Deployable Parts are now always deployed when they appear in a rescue mission
    - Contracts are now updated for crew capacity when a part is deployed

I will ask that this thread will be moved to the AddOn Releases Category.

Download:

[![MRispXN.png](http://i.imgur.com/MRispXN.png)](http://spacedock.info/mod/173/Kerbal%20Planetary%20Base%20Systems)[![cNJI52O.png](http://i.imgur.com/cNJI52O.png)](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/kerbal-planetary-base-systems)

**Please fully delete the old folder of the mod**! The folder structure has changed a lot

A documentation will come later this month, describin all parts and the usages of the live-support systems. 

**Further development and discussion of this mod will becontinued in the release thread:**  **[RELEASE THREAD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/133606-1)**

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-06T13:54:14Z" title="03/06/2016 01:54  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 6, 2016</time> by Nils277**

I'm running latest KSP in 64bit Linux.

It seems there is an interference with Planetary Base System and other Mods. I've got infernal robotics and KIS/KAS installed and the additional menu options do not appear in SPH and VAB. The functionality and operations of these two mods are not interfered with as far as I can tell.

Any other bits of information you need to diagnose this issue?

PS. In the main folder is a config file that enables/disables cartain entries in the lists
